sect3.title: Configuration Information

screen.userinput:
cat > ~/.fetchmailrc << "EOF" set logfile /var/log/fetchmail.log set no bouncemail set postmaster root
poll SERVERNAME : user [username] pass [password]; mda "/usr/bin/procmail -f %F -d %T"; EOF
chmod 0600 ~/.fetchmailrc

sect3.para: This is an example configuration that should suffice for most people. You can add as many users and servers as you need using the same syntax.
man fetchmail: Look for the section near the bottom named CONFIGURATION EXAMPLES. It gives some quick examples. There are countless other config options once you get used to it.
